name: typescriptdemo
description: Toy project to create a default configuration for woring with TypeScript, ESLint, Mocha and Chai in the same NodeJS project

scripts.run-container: sudo docker run -it --rm --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --mount type=bind,src="$(pwd)",dst=/home "${npm_package_config_container_tag}" echo No start script defined
scripts.start: sudo docker run -it --rm --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --mount type=bind,src="$(pwd)",dst=/home "${npm_package_config_container_tag}" yarn boot

author: Sylvain Leroux
